creator: pasuladi@rediffmail.com
text:
My machine is connected to internet through proxy behind a firewall.
Simple mail task is failing with 'Unknown SMTP Host 'exception.
Can any body suggest a solution.

creator: stevel@apache.org
text:
1. talk to a different mailserver

2. maybe <setproxy> can be used to set a socks proxy host; if this does not work
then there is nothing that can be done.

-try these two options, if one works, set this bug to fixed, if not, it'll be a
wontfix. Sorry.
seems to be the wontfix case.
creator: bodewig@apache.org
